entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Gatineau

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
